news1.Headline: Base surpasses $2 billion in total value locked.
news1.News:
Base surpasses $2 billion in total value locked, a 370% increase YTD
 Base is now the second-largest optimistic rollup after Arbitrum.

news2.Headline: Solana DeFi activity sees 50% growth over the last quarter.
news2.News: Solana's decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem experienced a 50% increase in activity, with more users engaging in DeFi applications and higher TVL recorded on the blockchain.

news3.Headline: Fed keeps interest rates steady amid economic uncertainty.
news3.News: The Federal Reserve announced it would keep interest rates unchanged in its latest meeting, citing concerns over slowing economic growth and inflationary risks.
